name: Ruined (Magys)
description:
The world has been ruined. You awake to a mysterious world overrun by monsters. Journey through the mountains with an army of monsters by your side to uncover the secrets of this world and rebuild hope!

Click Download to play a free demo! And don't forget to submit some feedback at feedback@magys.net or leaving a comment below to help improve everyone's experience!

Featuring:

Secrets galore! Explore a wide world and experience the mysteries hidden behind every bush!

Night only ends when you concede, or die!

Monsters emerge in greater swarms and strength as the night continues!

Monster seeds allow you to grow your own monsters to join your side against the swarms!

A variety of ecosystems to explore with unique monsters and secrets!

With much more in the demo and to come!
